title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: When the view is resized smaller, the close button moves down and is no longer on the same line as the label. This causes a usability problem as users are accustomed to the close button being on the same line as the label and located to the far right corner.
EB: The close button should stay on the same line as the label regardless of how small the view is resized. It should be located to the far right corner in order to maintain expected usability.
